fees.description:
There are no exit fees associated with this offer. We may vary the Charges and fees at any time by notice to you, including by message on your bill. Details about Charges and fees are set out under the terms and conditions of your Market Agreement.
Usage aggregated according to Australian Eastern Standard Time (AEST). Your usage may be adjusted for local time (Australian Daylight Savings Time). Further information on our charges is available at: http://tangoenergy.com/additional-charges
0.32% for debit card payments made by MasterCard or Visa where we incur a merchant services fee. Not applicable to direct debit payments by debit card.
0.78% for credit card payments made by MasterCard, Visa or AMEX where we incur a merchant services fee. Not applicable to direct debit payments by credit card.
$7.50 (exc. GST) if your payment is dishonoured or reversed.
$93.50 (inc. GST) Standard rates apply during business hours. Fees are set by your distributor or metering coordinator and will be quoted when requested.
$80.30 (inc. GST) Standard rates apply during business hours. Fees are set by your distributor or metering coordinator and will be quoted when requested.

gasContract.terms: This contract is ongoing and may be terminated by you or us in accordance with the terms of our Market Agreement. The full terms and conditions applicable to this offer are available at http://tangoenergy.com/terms-and-conditions.
gasContract.variation: Prices under this plan are variable and may be varied by notice to you. We will provide you with information about any variations in accordance with Energy Laws.

eligibility.information: This offer is only available to new residential customers via the Tango Energy website. You must: take up both gas and electricity; make a one-off prepayment of $200 via direct debit to your gas account; agree to receive your bills electronically; and enter into a direct debit arrangement for the ongoing payment of your energy bills.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Our Market Contract is ongoing and may be ended by you or us in accordance with the terms of the contract.
